name: Lorraine Fraser Marketing
description:
I provide full-service marketing consultancy service on an outsourced basis for business owners, nationwide and internationally, with a unique combination of marketing strategy, implementation, analytic expertise and creative and agency support.
​

My services provide a viable, much lower cost alternative to employing an in-house marketing team and paying for high salaries, expenses, cars and pensions providing the marketing services you need, in one bespoke package at very competitive pricing.
